spatial_accuracy.notes: The 3D render bears no resemblance to the 2D floor plan. Rooms are completely different, and none of the original plan's features are present.

structural_fidelity.notes: There are no matching rooms, wall configurations, staircases, or bathrooms. The entire structure is a hallucination of a different floor plan.

furniture_mapping.notes: The 2D floor plan only shows kitchen appliances. The 3D render contains completely different rooms with their own furniture, none of which can be mapped to the original plan.

aesthetic_quality.notes: The rendering itself is aesthetically pleasing with good lighting and clean geometry, but it is entirely incorrect in terms of content compared to the floor plan.

detected_errors.description: Entire room layout and all internal walls are hallucinated.
Bathroom is missing and replaced by a different bathroom layout.
Multiple new rooms (bedrooms, study, etc.) are hallucinated.
All doors and windows are misplaced as the structural layout is completely different.
Room proportions are entirely different due to a complete change in floor plan.
